content.rendered:
Welcome to the spa at umodzi park

Relax Revatilise Revive

An oasis of luxury in the heart of Lilongwe.

Book An Appointment

Located at Umodzi Park where world leaders meet, our spa is an oasis for locals and internationals. Our well-rounded approach encourages the well-being of mind, body, and spirit. The Spa at Umodzi is committed to service excellence and extraordinary spa experiences.

Wellness

We help you attain better physical and mental health

Beauty

Beyond how you look, we help you feel beautiful inside and out

Massage

We know all the right pressure points to have you feeling renewed.

Restore your balance

We are dedicated to restoring beauty and balance through individual treatments personalized for each of our guests by exceptionally skilled therapists. 

Book Now
01

Massage Therapy

Our therapists know all the pressure points from deep tissue to Swedish massages.

02

Skin Care Therapy

We have a range of treatments for improving the skin’s overall health and appearance.

03

Waxing

Our wax specialists are here to help you look and feel flawless.

Have a Look at Our

Specialised Treatments

You deserve the best and we offer the best

01.

Deep Tissue Massage

Deep tissue massage centers on realigning the deeper layers of connective and muscle tissue. 

Starting From $51
Book Now
02.

Stone Therapy

Hot stone therapy is a specialist massage that uses smooth, flat, heated basalt stones to help you relax and ease tense muscles and damaged soft tissues throughout your body.

Starting From $51
Book Now
03.

Aroma Therapy

 When inhaled, the scent molecules in essential oils that we use travel from the olfactory nerves directly to the brain and especially impact the amygdala, the emotional center of the brain.

Starting From $51
Book Now
04.

Skin Treatment

Dermo control, matsimela facial, purity facial, and many different treatments for the face body, and skin.

Starting From $22
Book Now
The Spa at Umodzi Park go further and beyond to create bespoke spa experiences and skin treatments that work.I strongly recommend them.
HAZEL MAK
Musician
What Are You Waiting For...

Make an appointment

Our location

President Hotel Second Floor
BICC , City Center Lilongwe

Opening Hours

Mon-Sun: 9am-9pm

Contact

Phone:
+265-997-248-883
+265-993-569-645

Hotel extension 20004
Email: umodzispa@gmail.com
